docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Concern about osteoporosis, a crippling bone disorder that afflicts mainly elderly women, has spawned a cynical campaign by the dairy industry aimed at teen-age girls.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Concern about osteoporosis, a crippling bone disorder that afflicts mainly elderly women, has spawned a cynical campaign by the dairy industry aimed at teen-age girls.
